name: HostASP
tag_list: web-hosting, linux-hosting, asp-net-hosting, asp-hosting, windows-hosting, vps-hosting, virtual-private-servers, dedicated-servers
overview:
HostASP offers affordable Linux based and Windows based web hosting services. Our services include Shared web hosting, Virtual private servers, dedicated servers, managed support services and custom software development. Our products are much offered at affordable compared to market rates and also we ensure, we deliver reliable services, and serve customers with best in class support and services.

We are Chennai based fast growing web hosting company in India. Our commitment to the hosting services and long-standing reputation of providing the highest levels of customer service makes us stand apart from crowd of other hosting companies that are budding -day in and out.

Our Management and Standards

  • S Ramadoss, one of company board member at AIM DOMAIN SOLUTIONS (p) LTD governs this channel of service and has good experience on open-source, commercial Microsoft Products and development services. Our company is managed by group of senior software professionals over 10-12 years of experience in IT, hosting and S/W development services.

  • We understand success of any business largely depends on ability to maintain good relationship with customers, adapt to technology challenges, streamline business processes and operations across enterprises. We always ensure adapt to the standards, deliver best quality products & services to our customers and addressing them on timely manner.
